definition.de: Mitglieder des Gerichts, die zu Gericht sitzen und Recht sprechen
definition.dk: Den eller de personer, der træffer juridiske afgørelser.
definition.en-GB: Official who decides cases in a court of law and passes sentences on those found guilty
definition.en-US: Official who decides cases in a court of law and passes sentences on those found guilty
definition.pt-BR: Membro do poder judiciário que tem autoridade para julgar
definition.pt-PT: Membro do poder judicial que tem autoridade para julgar.
definition.se: Den person eller de personer som leder förhandlingen i domstolen och fäller avgörandet.
